analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.doFinalize (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#367-375):
	External calls:
	- createTeamTokenByPercentage() (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#373)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#373)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#374)

Crowdsale.createTeamTokenByPercentage (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#250-269) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(addr,ntoken) (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#265-268)

Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#274-321) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#317)

Crowdsale.doFinalize (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#367-375) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#373)

Crowdsale.createTeamTokenByPercentage has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(addr,ntoken) (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#265-268)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#222-232):
	External calls:
	- token_decimals != token.decimals() (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#230-231)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- multisigWallet (/unique_contracts/0x2cccc3f5351c916b0e92c72af007641551c96bfa.sol#231-232)
